action_label: Let’s create your first Material Request
description:
## Track Material Request

Also known as Purchase Request or an Indent, is a document identifying a requirement of a set of items (products or services) for various purposes like procurement, transfer, issue, or manufacturing.

Once the Material Request is validated, a purchase manager can take the next actions for purchasing items like requesting RFQ from a supplier or directly placing an order with an identified Supplier.
name: Track Material Request
title: Track Material Request
